column2: Document Title: ITP-269-CIV-CPD-Bio-Retention Basin Supply & Installation
ITP Description: Bio-Retention Basin Supply & Installation
ITP approved for use by: Pradeep Talasila
Acceptance Criteria - HDPE Flexible Membrane - 1.5mm Thick
Reference - IFC Drawing MW MUSIC GL, MW 21.A.038
Acceptance Criteria - Drainage Material supplied in accordance with IFC Drawing, MW 21.A.038 & MW MUSIC GL
Reference - IFC Drawing MW MUSIC GL, MW 21.A.038
Acceptance Criteria - Drainage Material supplied in accordance with IFC Drawing, MW 21.A.038 & MW MUSIC GL
Reference - IFC Drawing MW MUSIC GL, MW 21.A.038
Acceptance Criteria - Drainage Material supplied in accordance with IFC Drawing, MW 21.A.038 & MW MUSIC GL
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision
Frequency - Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria - Prior to commencement of excavation for the Bio-Retention Basin the Contractor shall confirm the position of the Bio-Retention Basin with the Superintendent.
Acceptance Criteria - Excavation shall be to the depth indicated on the IFC drawings.
Acceptance Criteria - Placed in accordance to Manufacturers Specifications
Acceptance Criteria - uPVC Pipe shall be placed with 2m spacing between pipes. Pipes, geocompotises and geotextiles placed, joined and lapped in accordance with specified requirements.
Acceptance Criteria - Placed in confirming to IFC Drawing shall be supplied and compacted to a Thickness: >=200mm
Acceptance Criteria - Placed in confirming to IFC Drawing shall be supplied and compacted to a Thickness: >=100mm
Acceptance Criteria - Placed in confirming to IFC Drawing shall be supplied and compacted to a Thickness: >=300mm
○ Filter Media to be installed in two parts.
○ Each Layer of Filter Media to be lightly compacted with a single pass of vibrating plate
Reference - Design surface level as per IFC drawings
Acceptance Criteria - Provide record of dimensional measurements to demonstrate the drainage lines are installed within the tolerances specified in Section 701.10
Verifying Documents - This ITP, As Built Survey Report

On behalf of Metropolitan Roads Program Alliance, it is hereby certified that the Works represented by the item of work listed have been tested in accordance with the Project Quality Plan and conform in all respects with the requirements of the Contract.
